attributes.action: Tax The Welsh & Scots to enter England
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This petition is proposing the levy of a Tax for the entry into ENGLAND of all Welsh & Scots. Not only will this raise revenue, it will also create jobs at the new "Border crossing" checkpoints.

Swing low, sweet chariot, coming for to carry me home.....

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
